00009 //This file contains a bunch of handy snippets for debugging, mostly
00010 //runtime checks like memory usage and stopwatches.
00011 
00012 #define DEBUG_PREFIX std::cout << "@ " << __FILE__ << ":" << __LINE__
00013 #define DEBUG_CHECKPOINT DEBUG_PREFIX << std::endl;
00014 #define DEBUG_PRINT(output) DEBUG_PREFIX<<output << std::endl;
00015 #define DEBUG_VALUE(value) DEBUG_PREFIX << ":\n" << std::boolalpha      \
00016                                         <<"  "#value"= [" << (value)    \
00017                                         <<"]" << std::endl;

00030     const time_log check_clock(){
00031     static TStopwatch watch;
00032     watch.Stop();
00033     time_log log(1000 * watch.CpuTime(), 1000 * watch.RealTime());
00034     watch.Start();
00035     return log;
00036   }
